result.title: Observational gaps revealed by model sensitivity studies
result.description: The report will have three parts addressing (1) the OSSE experiment of ocean and sea ice performed by UHAM, (2) similar-OSSE study done in FMI for the atmosphere (Tuomas Naakka supervised by Timo), and the model sensitivity experiment for greenhouse gases done by Mathias Goeckede (MPG) and his group.

result.title: GHG budgets - atmosphere
